endorsements.endorsement: I think she is a fantastic MP, she's Salford born and bred, and has always fought passionately for us.

quotes.text: For instance we've had lots of problems with litter on the pavements on Fairfield Street from a nearby takeaway. When Hazel knocked on my door she asked if there was anything she could do to help improve things in the community. I told her about the litter and she immediately got in contact with the Council, and within days action had been taken and the litter had been cleared up, and the street now looks clean and tidy.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet does not provide complete information to fill out all fields. It appears to be a personal endorsement from a constituent rather than official campaign material from the candidate.
